farmerBio: Family-run operation in the northern Negev focusing on water-efficient vegetables and herbs. Drip irrigation, cover crops, and minimal till protect the soil.
Small-batch organic orchards and seasonal open-field produce. We prioritize biodiversity corridors and beneficial insects over broad-spectrum sprays.
Cultivating high-quality fruits and olives in the Upper Galilee. We use sustainable water practices and focus on heirloom varieties.
A small vineyard and open-field farm near the coast. We specialize in seasonal greens and grapes, avoiding synthetic pesticides.
Dedicated to Medjool date production in the hot climate of the Jordan Valley. We utilize geothermal heating for early-season crops.
